ingredients.ingredient: 3 large ripe mangoes, peeled and cut into long, thin strips
2 red bell peppers, cut into long, thin strips
2 jicamas, peeled and cut into long, thin strips

cookingTips: Select mangoes that yield slightly to gentle pressure but aren't mushy
Cut all vegetables into uniform sizes for elegant presentation
Squeeze fresh lime juice over salad just before serving to prevent browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you select perfectly ripe mangoes and cut them uniformly for this beautiful salad?
